short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a few nifty features to toyota nation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a few nifty features to toyotanation.com (also works with benzworld.org).

* Make images zoomable.
* Add infinite scrolling.
* Add a custom image to the upper right corner.
* Specify up to 200 threads in the gen 1 and 2 Camry forum.
* Change the forum to mimic reddit.com.
* Remove advertising ect.
* Fix annoying thread descriptions.
* and more!


This extension is not associated with toyota nation in any way.
